entry.title: Installing Windows 7 On My New G.Skill SSD
entry.summary:
I got a new Thursday and I’ve been repaving my laptop with Windows 7 x64 RC
The first thing was that Windows install time was about 30 min. This was my first confirmation that I was gonna love my new drive.
The first thing I installed was Visual Studio

entry.title: Windows Critics: Get a life
entry.summary:
I was working on a Windows 7
Two criticisms that I have heard leveled at Windows 7 are:
It’s too soon (3 years) to roll out a new OS. It’s just a Vista
I’d like to take a minute or two to answer those from my own perspective. First to the criticism

entry.title: ASP.NET: System.BadImageFormatException
entry.summary:
If you are running on Vista x64
System.BadImageFormatException
By default IIS 7 won’t load x86 (32 bit) assemblies, make sure you set your application pool’s “Enable 32-Bit Applications” setting to “True”.
Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager
